name: tilmeld
description: Nymph user and group management with access controls.

scripts.build: npm run build-components && npm run build-entities
scripts.build-components: npm run build-login && npm run build-recover && npm run build-change-password
scripts.build-login: svelte compile --format es src/Components/TilmeldLogin.html > lib/Components/TilmeldLogin.js && babel lib/Components/TilmeldLogin.js -o lib/Components/TilmeldLogin.js
scripts.build-recover: svelte compile --format es src/Components/TilmeldRecover.html > lib/Components/TilmeldRecover.js && babel lib/Components/TilmeldRecover.js -o lib/Components/TilmeldRecover.js
scripts.build-change-password: svelte compile --format es src/Components/TilmeldChangePassword.html > lib/Components/TilmeldChangePassword.js && babel lib/Components/TilmeldChangePassword.js -o lib/Components/TilmeldChangePassword.js

author: Hunter Perrin <hperrin@gmail.com>
